title:
Quasi-classical expansion of a hyperbolic solution to the star-star
  relation and multicomponent 5-point difference equations
abstract:
The quasi-classical expansion of a multicomponent spin solution of the
star-star relation with hyperbolic Boltzmann weights is investigated. The
equations obtained in a quasi-classical limit provide n-1-component extensions
of certain scalar 5-point equations (corresponding to n=2) that were previously
investigated by the author in the context of integrability and consistency of
equations on face-centered cubics.
subjects: Nonlinear Sciences/Exactly Solvable and Integrable Systems
